text: ثُمَّ بَعَثْنَـٰهُمْ لِنَعْلَمَ أَىُّ ٱلْحِزْبَيْنِ أَحْصَىٰ لِمَا لَبِثُوٓا۟ أَمَدًا

translation.en.sahih: Then We awakened them that We might show which of the two factions was most precise in calculating what [extent] they had remained in time.
translation.id.indonesian: Kemudian Kami bangunkan mereka, agar Kami mengetahui manakah di antara kedua golongan itu] yang lebih tepat dalam menghitung berapa lama mereka tinggal (dalam gua itu).
